description:
InSIST Global provides a scalable, flexible cloud-based business management solutions with a suite of complimentary mobile apps to help SMBs optimise their processes and increase cash flow.

Responsible for creating and maintaining the apps for solutions business management and service sales using React, Ruby on Rails, and other related technologies.
description_points: Designed architecture of two major projects for The Ministry of Higher Education, Research, Science & Technology of The Gambia – focusing on improving quality of education and school management nationwide.
Increased business software application user base 15% by recommending features improvements to address needs of potential users.
Analyzed and troubleshot technical issues, resolving cases related to bugs and errors within one day.
Led 5-member team in front-end and back-end development, ensuring timely and quality completion of complex projects.
key_achievements: Received appraisal after the completion of the project
Saw other members of the team I lead being promoted

description: Played key role in back-end and front-end software development / implementation.
description_points: Developed and delivered an app quickly.
Committed to the customer experience, design and flows.
Created reports and analytics dashboards – including administrative features.
key_achievements: Contributed to development of software tool for businesses with 5,000+ users.
Built loan module of business software application

description: Played key role in back-end and front-end software development / implementation.
description_points: Created reports and analytics dashboards – including administrative features.
Troubleshot, debugged, and upgraded existing software.
key_achievements: I worked on the documentation of certain projects, meet with customers to train them. This earn me a permanent role as a Software Engineer at InSIST Global.
